Module com.github.robtimus.servlet
Package com.github.robtimus.servlet.http

Class BodyCapturingFilter.BodyCapturingResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • jakarta.servlet.ServletResponseWrapper
      • jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponseWrapper
        • com.github.robtimus.servlet.http.OutputTransformingHttpServletResponseWrapper
          • com.github.robtimus.servlet.http.BodyCapturingFilter.BodyCapturingResponse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpServletResponse, ServletResponse
    Enclosing class:
    BodyCapturingFilter
    protected final class BodyCapturingFilter.BodyCapturingResponse
extends OutputTransformingHttpServletResponseWrapper
    An HttpServletResponse wrapper that captures the response's body as it's written.
    Author:
    Rob Spoor

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse

    • Method Detail

      • transform

        protected OutputStream transform​(ServletOutputStream outputStream)
                          throws IOException
        Description copied from class: OutputTransformingHttpServletResponseWrapper
        Transforms the original ServletOutputStream.

        This default implementation returns the unmodified argument.

        Overrides:
        transform in class OutputTransformingHttpServletResponseWrapper
        Parameters:
        outputStream - The original ServletOutputStream to transform.
        Returns:
        An OutputStream that is the result of transforming the given ServletOutputStream. It does not necessary have to be a ServletOutputStream.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an I/O error occurred during the transformation.

      • transform

        protected Writer transform​(PrintWriter writer)
                    throws IOException
        Description copied from class: OutputTransformingHttpServletResponseWrapper
        Transforms the original PrintWriter.

        This default implementation returns the unmodified argument.

        Overrides:
        transform in class OutputTransformingHttpServletResponseWrapper
        Parameters:
        writer - The original PrintWriter to transform.
        Returns:
        A Writer that is the result of transforming the given PrintWriter. It does not necessary have to be a PrintWriter.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an I/O error occurred during the transformation.

        Specified by:

        public void reset()
        Specified by:
        reset in interface ServletResponse
        Overrides:

      • captureMode

        public BodyCapturingFilter.CaptureMode captureMode()
        Returns the capture mode:
        • BodyCapturingFilter.CaptureMode.BYTES if ServletResponse.getOutputStream() was used.
        • BodyCapturingFilter.CaptureMode.TEXT if ServletResponse.getWriter() was used.
        • BodyCapturingFilter.CaptureMode.NONE if neither method was used.
        Returns:
        The capture mode.

      • capturedBinaryBody

        public byte[] capturedBinaryBody()
        Returns the captured binary body.
        Returns:
        A byte array with the captured binary body.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the body has not been captured as bytes.
        See Also:
        captureMode()

      • capturedBinaryBodyAsString

        public String capturedBinaryBodyAsString()
        Returns the captured binary body as a string. This method will use the request's character encoding if available; otherwise the ServletContext's request character encoding if available; otherwise StandardCharsets.UTF_8.
        Returns:
        The captured binary body as a string.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the body has not been captured as bytes.
        See Also:
        captureMode()

      • capturedTextBody

        public String capturedTextBody()
        Returns the captured text body.
        Returns:
        The captured text body.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the body has not been captured as text.
        See Also:
        captureMode()

      • totalBodySize

        public long totalBodySize()
        Returns the total body size, as far as the body has already been written. This can be a number of bytes or characters, depending on the capture mode.
        Returns:
        The total body size.
